name: LiftFactorConnect
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lift factor connect
des:
The Lift Factor Connect Skill is a companion to the Lift Factor Connect Brochure and permits a user to access and share the same information that is delivered in the brochure. It is a powerful sales tool which permits prospects wishing to launch a Lift Factor Connect campaign to easily demo and share this powerful marketing technology with team members. Once the decision is made to create a Lift Factor Connect campaign, this app is helpful in sharing the concept and capabilities of the technology with the creative team as they create a Lift Factor Connect campaign of their own.

This Skill is also a wonderful prototype of the type of companion Skill that comes with every Lift Factor Connect campaign. It demonstrates how recipients of the Lift Factor Connect Brochure can access the same information as contained in the card.... plus any additional information that the sponsor desires to add. Keep in mind, that while the information contained on a Lift Factor Connect Brochure is finite, the information in the companion Alexa Skill is infinite. The Lift Factor Connect Companion Skill may be refreshed and expanded ….. on a regular basis. The Lift Factor Connect Companion Skill may even be made a part of the user’s Daily Briefing on their Echo Device. … Now that’s what we call Connecting!
